description:
The polkadot.js features wrapped into a no-code plugin.

Build projects on Polkadot network without code.
It opens a door to the Polkadot ecosystem for no-code developers.

This plugin is free thanks to Web3 Foundation

# Features
Wallet extension:
- Connect to the polkadot.js extension wallet
- Sign a message
- Sign and Send Transaction
- Set a custom RPC url
- Detect if extension is installed
- List connected wallets and their names

Utils:
- Generate Mnemonic
- Validate Address
- Encrypt & Decrypt Messages
- Generate a Multisig Account
- Verify Signature
- Hash Data

API:
- Get Balance of Address
- Get Balance at specific Block
- Get Last Block nr.
- Subscribe to Balance Changes
- Subscribe to new Blocks
- Get Chain details: name, symbol etc.

Keyring:
- Add Wallet to Keyring (with mnemonic phrase)
- Get Wallet Metadata
- Set SS58 Format
- Remove Wallet from keyring
- Get All Wallets in Keyring
- Sign a Message
- Verify Signature


Demo: 
https://polkadotjs.bubbleapps.io/version-test/

Documentation:
https://polkadotjs.docs.ezcodeplugins.com/
